fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may take the Ball from any Rugby player.
- Each night you fail to kill a player with the Ball, your attack level increases by 1 until you lose the Ball.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know the name of any non-Rugby player who steals the Ball.
- At night, if you have the Ball and successfully kill someone, you instead pass the ball to your second target and don't attack them.
- Factional chat
- Gains powerful defense if carrying the Ball
- Replaces abilities with factional kill if carrying the Ball

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the team.
